channel.title: Rick Wicklin on Andrey Akinshin
channel.description: Recent content in Rick Wicklin on Andrey Akinshin

item.title: Jittering as a Statistical Irony
item.description: The act of jittering (adding random noise to data) is a statistical irony: statisticians spend most of their day trying “remove” noise from data, but jittering puts noise back in!

item.title: To Jitter or Not to jitter: That is the Question
